text: Wham! Bam! Islam! is a 2011 PBS documentary by Isaac Solotaroff broadcast in October that year as the season premiere of PBS's series "Independent Lens"."Along the Heated Trail of the Man Who Created Muslim Superheroes", nytimes.com, 12 October 2011. Retrieved 5 October 2015."Wham! Bam! Islam!", pbs.org, 13 October 2011. Retrieved 5 October 2015."The Film", itvs.org. Retrieved 5 October 2015. The documentary follows Naif Al-Mutawa, creator of the comic book The 99 and the animated TV-series The 99 and was pitched at the 2009 Sheffield Doc/Fest MeetMarket. == References == == External links == * Category:American documentary films Category:American films Category:American television films Category:2011 television films Category:Documentary films about Islam in the United States
title: Wham! Bam! Islam!
